Title: Establishes a commission to study how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes a commission to study how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a commission to study how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
